payload.query:
query GetTalentProfile($profileUrl: String, $jobProposalId: ID, $openingId: ID, $viewerMode: Boolean, $freeText: String, $skillIds: [ID!], $occupationIds: [ID!]) {
    talentVPDAuthProfile(
      filter: {
        profileUrl: $profileUrl,
        jobProposalId: $jobProposalId,
        openingId: $openingId,
        viewerMode: $viewerMode,
        freeText: $freeText,
        skillIds: $skillIds,
        occupationIds: $occupationIds,
        excludePortfolio: true,
        excludeAgencies: false
      }
    ) {
      ...ProfileResponseFragment
    }
  }
  fragment ProfileResponseFragment on TalentVPDProfileResponse {
  vettedBadge {
    vetted
  }
  vanityUrl
  vettedTalentBadge {
    badge
  }
  pibStatus {
    active
  }
  identity {
    uid: id
    id
    userId
    ciphertext
    recno
    legacyCiphertext
    edcUserId
    owner
  }
  profile {
    name
    firstName
    shortName
    title
    description
    location {
      country
      city
      state
      countryTimezone
      worldRegion
      timezoneOffset
      countryCodeIso2
      countryCodeIso3
    }
    portrait {
      portrait
      bigPortrait
      smallPortrait
      originalPortrait
      portrait500
    }
    skills {
      node {
        uid: id
        id
        name
        prettyName
        active
        rank
        description
        externalUrl
        certificates {
          uid: id
          id
          name
          description
          provider
          logoUrl
          verifier
        }
      }
    }
    visibility
    disabled
    affiliated
    looking
    lookingWeek
    exposeFullName
    confidentialityBound
    consoleViewable
    agencyRef
    idVerified
    exposeBillings
    pci {
      action
      actionCredit
      actual
      timeStamp
      display
    }
    phoneVerified
    state
    hideAgencyEarnings
    contractorTier
    exclusiveAgencyContractor
    hideJss
    idBadgeStatus
    contractToHire
    agencyId
  }
  stats {
    totalHours
    totalHoursRecent
    totalFeedback
    totalFeedbackRecent
    totalJobsWorked
    totalJobsWorkedRecent
    rating
    ratingRecent
    hourlyRate {
      node {
        currencyCode
        amount
      }
    }
    totalPortfolioItems
    englishLevel
    memberSince
    lastWorkedOn
    hireAgainPercentage
    totalHourlyJobs
    totalHourlyJobsRecent
    totalFixedJobs
    totalFixedJobsRecent
    recommended
    responsiveState
    privateFeedbackHireAgain
    scores
    totalRevenue
    skillTestsPassed
    activeInterviews
    activeAssignments
    nSS100BwScore
    topRatedStatus
    totalHoursActual
    edcAssignments
    totalEarnings
    recentEarnings
    averageRecentEarnings
    recentCharge
    averageRecentCharge
    topRatedPlusStatus
    contractorEarnings
    totalDraftPortfolioItems
    nssLastCalculated
  }
  groups {
    uid: id
    id
    name
    logo
    uniqueName
  }
  agencies {
    name
    logo
    recentHours
    score
    recno
    scoreRecent
    totalFeedback
    totalHours
    agencyRate {
      node {
        currencyCode
        amount
      }
    }
    nSS100BwScore
    topRatedStatus
    topRatedPlusStatus
    hideEacEarnings
    ciphertext
    uid: id
    id
    defaultAgency
  }

  portfolios {
    node {
      uid: id
      id
      title
      description
      rank
      url
      image
      thumbnail
      completedOn
      projectUrl
      videoUrl
      occupationId
      role
      projectGoal
      solution
      primaryImageId
      highlighted
      visibility
    }
  }
  availability {
    uid: id
    id
    source
    availabilityTimeStamp
    capacity {
      uid: id
      id
      name
    }
    creationTimeStamp
    minHours
    maxHours
    availableDays
  }
  clientRelationship {
    type
    title
    startDate
    endDate
    contractRid: contractId
  }
  languages {
    uid: id
    id
    language {
      iso639Code,
      active,
      englishName
    }
    proficiencyLevel {
      code
      proficiencyTitle
      rank
      description
    }
    verified
    verifiedByCertificate
    verifiedByFeedback
  }
  certificates {
    node {
      uid: id
      id
      certificate {
        uid: id
        id
        name
        description
        verificationGuideline
        provider
        certificateSkills {
          uid: id
          id
          skill
          prettyName
          description
          externalLink
        }
        logoUrl
        verificationRequired
        highlighted
        verified
        verifier
      }
      dateEarned
      verified
      url
      active
      submissionCode
      expirationDate
    }
  }
  employmentHistory {
    uid: id
    id
    companyName
    jobTitle
    startDate
    endDate
    description
    city
    country
  }
  education {
    uid: id
    id
    institutionName
    areaOfStudy
    degree
    dateStarted
    dateEnded
    comment
  }
  otherExperiences {
    uid: id
    id
    subject
    description
    active
    creationTimeStamp
    lastUpdateTimeStamp
  }
  esn {
    esnName
    esnId
    esnUserProfile
    public
    revokedOn
  }
  jobCategories {
    groupId
    groupName
    selectedCategories {
      uid: id
      id
      name
    }
  }
  projectCategories {
    uid: id
    id
    level1
    level2
    seoLink
  }
  specializedProfilesInfo {
    profileId
    rank
    status
    occupations {
      node {
        occupationId
        prefLabel
      }
    }
    selectedSkills {
      node {
        skillId
        freetextAnswer
      }
    }
    otherSkills {
      node {
        skillId
        freetextAnswer
      }
    }
  }
  communityCertificates {
    uid: id
    id
    businessName
    expirationDate
    certificate {
      uid: id
      id
      name
      provider
    }
  }
  jobProposal {
    openingId
    openingSkills {
      name
    }
  }
  video
  hideEarnings
}

profile.name: Aminur R.
profile.title: Wordpress Speed Optimization Expert | PageSpeed GTmetrix 95+ score
profile.description:
Do you want to increase your wordpress site's speed? 
Yes, I can improve your wordpress / WooCommerce site's Mobile and Desktop both speed around 95/100 according to Google PageSpeed Insights...

education.institutionName: Shahjalal University of Science and Technology
